nodes.text: Sir Jared Rutledge was a minor House Mecetti noble from the Tapani sector. He had a brooding nature and was said to be a loner.

Jared was a covert operative for House Mecetti. He was equally competent in working the underbelly of society as well as mixing with the noble elite. A patient man, Jared did not like to take unnecessary risk. He was loyal to his house but was not beyond making deals with his enemies if it achieved his objectives.
